poll.question: ## How long have you been studying with us?
poll.answers: [["long", {"label": "A very long time", "img": null}], ["short", {"label": "Not very long", "img": null}], ["not_saying", {"label": "I shall not say", "img": null}], ["longer", {"label": "Longer than you", "img": null}]]

### Thank you
for being a valued student.
